title: Leech (X)
text: This model can heal 'x' health on each successful Basic Attack , per Action Point (AP) spent (not including the additional AP required for a Charge), that damages an enemy model.  A model can never heal more from a Leech attack than the damage their attack inflicted on their target. Leech can only be triggered during this model's activation and triggers at the end of Step 5 of the Attack Process.
